body.name: HYLONE Office Chair, White Computer Desk Chair, Mid-Back Task Chair Swivel, Flip-up Arms, Lumbar Support, Adjustable Height, Grey Mesh
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Comfortable Office Chair】 The backrest of this mid-back desk chair aligns the natural curve of the spine to assist your back and shoulder in a natural seated position, reduce pressure and muscle fatigue. With built-in lumbar support, it offers sufficient support for your lower waist

【Flip up Arms】 Foldable arms allow better use of limited space. You can push the chair under the desk when not use it. It’s suitable for the living room, study room, meeting room, computer desk, and work from home.
【Rocking Office Chair】 120° rocking mode helps you to relax from heavy work, pull out the lever for rocking function, pull it in to stop rocking and keep in upright position.
【Adjustable Height Office Chair】 With BIFMA certified gas lift, it is smooth to raise or lower the seat height(18.1"-21.6"), suitable for different people, and meet your different needs.

【High Quality Materials】 1.The breathable mesh back keeps air flow, offers cool comfort all day long; 2.Thicken seat offers great comfort, and relieves pressure to your hips and legs; 3.Nylon dual-wheel casters offers great stability and mobility
body.description: Have a comfortable and relaxing working day with our Adjustable Home Office Desk Chair! Let this ergonomic, mid-back mesh computer desk chair bring your workday to new heights. This mesh office chair is comfortable for long time sitting! Adjustable height is suitable for different height table; Flip up arms, built-in lumbar support, and its rocking function ensure a cozier experience for both working and relax! Features: Adjustable Height Flip-up Armrests Lumbar Support Rocking 360 Degree Swivel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for your desk
reviews.reviewText: As I type this review, I am sitting in this chair. It is such a massive upgrade compared to what I was sitting in before, and I already feel so much more comfortable and relaxed.When the package arrived, it came in this big old box with all the parts tightly held together to prevent shifting during shipping. It also came with a very simple manual on how to set up the chair, some screws and a monkey wrench. All in all, I laid out all the pieces and it took me about a solid 30 minutes to set up the entire chair. The setup was pretty straightforward, just make sure you follow the instructions to the letter, and maybe having an extra pair of hands could help you finish putting it together faster.Now let's talk about comfortability. This chair is comfortable, as it supports my posture and allows my body to relax. I don't have to lean forward on my desk or worry about resting my arms somewhere, as the armrests can be adjusted to your liking. The height adjustment is also great, and simple to use.If you plan on purchasing any office or at-home desk chair, buy this one and I promise you will not regret your decision!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable seat and back but there are a few negatives
reviews.reviewText: I think the seat and back is comfortable but there are a few negatives. I really wish I could lean it back even a few inches, its not adjustable. I also wish the arm rests could adjust up a little higher, if you rest your arms on the arm rests when typing they are to low and you cant change the height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I highly recommend making the investment in this chair. The chair is extremely high quality and has all the features needed. The chair has the lean-back feature and lock system. It was extremely easy to assemble. I highly recommend purchasing this chair as it was totally worth it, I truly love the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this chair… comfortable, easily adjusts, and easy to put together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ergonomic and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: It has a mid-back design with a contoured backrest that provides support to the lumbar region. The flip-up armrests also add to the BIG COMFORT FACTOR!, as they allow for easy movement and are adjustable according to the user's preference. The chair is also adjustable, which is a great feature for those who spend long hours at their desks (me). The height of the chair can be adjusted to suit the user's height, and the tilt tension can be adjusted to provide the perfect amount of support and resistance when leaning back. No damaged parts, no damage to box, great packaging overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as comfortable as most reviews say... UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: Bought this one based on the great reviews on how comfortable it is. For the price, there are not many adjustments that can be done to make it more comfortable; pretty much up and down only. Gave it it 3 stars because the color is as described, easy to assemble and it looks pretty good.UPDATE: The company reached out after my original review. They seem to care and stated that their R&D team would work on my concerns. We went back and forth a few times, and they responded very quickly. Adding one more star for great customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for an office chair
reviews.reviewText: Like the appearance and comfort. Bought one for my artist brother for his birthday. He loved it. Got one for myself, use for painting and writing. Good support and size, not too bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality control and company unresponsive (at first)
reviews.reviewText: I could not even assemble this chair because the screw holes did not line up between the chair cushion and the metal plate. I examined it very carefully and adjusted it very carefully, but the problem was not fixable: the holes of the cushion and the metal plate were about a quarter inch off from each other and there was no way to get the screws to go through. I can't imagine they are all like this (at least I hope not), so best case is they sent me a defective unit. I wrote to the company and got NO response. I suggest you do not purchase this chair - you cannot be sure what piece of junk they might end up sending you.UPDATE: The company finally did reach out to me, and they worked with me in good faith to try to solve the problem. They not only gave me a full refund, they sent me another chair free of charge. So I give them a lot of credit. Unfortunately the replacement chair had the same defect (see photo). The holes on the seat cushion and the back plate do not match, so cannot be connected. Apparently they got a bad batch of these chairs from the manufacturer. Hopefully they will fix it, but you might be taking a chance. In any case, if you do get a bad chair, at least you won't lose any money.
